author: gavin mahoney
comment: Won't even open, have tried over several days, wiped data, installed, but no matter what I do I just keep getting," unfortunately, feather has stopped working". So all in all,  a very useless app
title: Does not work.

author: Kuba Roth
comment: No eye candies just essential functionality. I really like simple idea of using folders as playlists. Just to confirm external card is supported, it is only tricky to figure out how to navigate there :)
title: Excellent!

author: Sheila R.
comment: Most Beautiful App Ever! Finally found my music app - Feather Free is a keeper. When I get all the settings figured out I will upgrade to ad-free. I discovered that long pressing my 'music' file in the list allowed me to set it as default which was a big relief (didn't have to scroll through irrelevant files). Working on the playlist part, but when that is done my other music app will be gone.  I would never leave my music app open because it was just ugly, even with colors I chose, but this is a delight!  And a bonus is being able to control from my Moto 360 watch.  Have to start on phone first, but that works for me. Developer has done a fantastic job! Lovely, did I say that already?

author: Jonathon Crow
comment: So, given that I'm using the free version, and I was just looking for something that could play a folder in its entirety, to that extent, it works swimmingly. The only issue I've come across thus far is that if I'm watching something in landscape so it's full screen, if I try to use the controls in the notification tray, it opens Google Play Music, and another music app for some reason. Not sure if that is an issue with Feather, or another app, though.

author: Joe P
comment: I really enjoy using this app looked for the pay version I'm using a Trio tablet as my radio /video player in my car ( but not sure if I will buy because the video and audio is off sync )
title: Feather - Free

author: Jason L
comment: Player looks nice, but I can't work out if there is subtitle support. A fine player for normal videos, but I'm looking for the most lightweight player that will play subbed mkv files.

author: Brandi Vogl
comment: On the lookout for an app that will play .wmv files as a playlist. Thought this app would be my answer. I will have to keep looking.
title: Doesn't play .wmv files

comment: If you can add thumbnail at least to the paid version I will buy it.
title: Feather free

author: Joseph Torres
comment: This app needs a full screen button. Too easy to overlook the need to actually change orientation to get into full screen as is. Just shy of perfect.
title: Full screen?

author: Supreeth Gowda
comment: All my videos and music start at 30:00 and go forward from there instead of 0:00. Not bad for a under 2mb player

reply.author: Aaron Turner
reply.content: Hmmm That is quite and odd bug, I will be looking into that for future updates!

title: Nice but...

author: Christopher Doolan
comment: This would be the perfect music player if you could set your default music folder instead of having to find it every time you open...

reply.author: Aaron Turner
reply.content: I actually had this planned for the next update, thank you very much for your feedback though!

author: Daniel Gomez
comment: Runs smoothly and helps me find files I normally can't play
title: Great app!

comment: Perfect lil app. No lag, no chop, no bloat. Thank you!
